skill_e.tooltip:
Passive: When Dr. Mundo suffers magic damage or pays a health cost, his magic resist is increased by 3% for ? seconds, up to a maximum of 6/15/24/33/42%.

Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack will headbutt the enemy, dealing an additional ? physical damage (3/3.5/4/4.5/5% of maximum health) at the cost of 25/35/45/55/65 health.

Upon activation, Dr. Mundo gains up to 60/90/120/150/180 attack damage (no less than 40/55/70/85/100) for 5 seconds based on his missing health.

Masochism grants ? attack damage above the minimum for every 1% of missing health (?).

skill_i.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

skill_q.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing 20/22.5/25/27.5/30% of the target's current health as magic damage (no less than 80/130/180/230/280) and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.

If the cleaver hits, ? health is refunded (? if the cleaver kills).

Infected Cleaver deals no more than 300/350/400/450/500 damage against monsters.

skill_r.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates ? Health (50/75/100% of max health) over 12 seconds, and gains 15/25/35% movement speed for the duration.

skill_w.tooltip:
Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing ? (+0.2) magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

While on fire, the duration of disables against Dr. Mundo are reduced by 30%.
